tactic: assert (Hf: forall k : nat, (k <= n)%nat -> ex_derive_n f k x) by apply H1.
exceptions.exn: Applied theorem does not have enough premises.

original: intros H1 H2. assert (Hf: forall k : nat, (k <= n)%nat -> ex_derive_n f k x) by apply H1. assert (Hg: forall k : nat, (k <= n)%nat -> ex_derive_n g k x) by apply H2. rewrite <- Derive_n_plus with (f := f) (g := fun x => - g x) (n := n) (x := x) in Hf, Hg.
